item.title: hosting,Coding,And Some HelpFull Hints to making your server the best!

item.description:
@t3h_0wn4g3 wrote:

[quote=“suisidexkl, post:1, topic:51672”]I will post some rules for this post and follow them all correctly please

rule#1) NO spamming[/quote]

i think you should add it all at once before you post.

also:
some rules:
no spamming.
no flamming.
no offencive language ( racism included! )
no ::catting and ::noclip’ing.
NEVER sell mod/admin positions
do not unban a player if they have broke a rule.

Read full topic
